description: Just under 2,000 doses are due to be given to care home staff from 21 December.
title: Covid: Second batch of vaccines arrive in Jersey
title_page: Covid: Second batch of vaccines arrive in Jersey - BBC News
maintext: Staff who offer home care or work in care homes will be prioritised for the jab, with the arrival of just under 2,000 doses of the Pfizer/BioNTech jab.
